name: CloudStorm
summary: API microservice using docker, postgres and Express; deployed on AWS t2.micro

name: Robin
summary: A retail page using React, Redux, React-router. Provides product overview, favorited styles and ratings & reviews for a large collection of merchandice.

name: Apptendance
description: An attendance app for use at Hack Reactor
summary: A single page app to take student attendance. The students tally persist in a Google Sheet and email templates are provided for tardies and absences.

name: fesh
summary: A simple command-line tool to make http requests. Provides most common requests methods and options for data and headers.

name: npmrum
description: CLI to run npm scripts for a given repo
summary: Command line app using react-ink to find and select available npm scripts. If the current directory contains a package.json, all available scripts will be accessible and ready to run.

name: g(it)ty
description: CLI to selectively add files for commit
summary: Command line app using react-ink to easily select the files to add before a commit. Helpful for organizing git commits.

name: kDice
summary: Single Page React App providing translation for Spanish coloquialisms by country

name: Namaslay
summary: A social media app for yoga and meditation, with where clients can access private rooms to practice and message.
